our_history.title: Our History
our_history.description: Launched in 2015, Exclusive is a leading online marketplace in South Asia with an active presence in Bangladesh. Supported by a wide range of personalized marketing, data, and service solutions, Exclusive has 10,500 sellers and 300 brands, serving 3 million customers in the region.
our_history.offer: Exclusive offers over 1 million products, growing rapidly. Exclusive's assortment includes various categories of products, from consumer electronics to home goods.

products.name: HAVIT HV-G92 Gamepad
products.description: Enjoy gaming sessions with the HAVIT HV-G92 Gamepad. With its ergonomic design and precise controls, it provides a comfortable and immersive gaming experience. Plus, with a 40% discount, it's a great deal!

products.name: Wired Keyboard AK-900
products.description: The AK-900 Wired Keyboard offers reliable performance and responsive keys for your typing needs. With a 35% discount, it's an affordable choice for both gamers and professionals.

products.name: Gaming Monitor IPS LCD
products.description: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals with the Gaming Monitor IPS LCD. With high-quality display and fast response times, it's perfect for gamers. And with a 30% discount, it's a great offer!

products.name: Liquid RGB CPU Cooler
products.description: Keep your CPU cool and running smoothly with the Liquid RGB CPU Cooler. Its efficient cooling system and colorful RGB lighting add style to your PC.

products.name: Canon EOS DSLR Mirrorless Camera
products.description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the Canon EOS DSLR Mirrorless Camera. Its advanced features and high-quality lens make it an ideal choice for photography enthusiasts.

products.name: GP11 Shooter USB Gamepad
products.description: Get ready for intense gaming action with the GP11 Shooter USB Gamepad. Its ergonomic design and responsive buttons provide precise control, and its affordable price makes it an excellent choice.

products.name: ASUS FHD Gaming Laptop
products.description: Experience smooth gaming performance with the ASUS FHD Gaming Laptop. With powerful hardware and a high-resolution display, it's perfect for gamers on the go.

products.name: Havic HV G-92 Controller Skin
products.description: PlayStation 5 controller skin made of high-quality vinyl with adhesive layer with air channels for easy installation without bubbles and clean removal without waste. Pressure sensitive.
